Summary: Required Field Marking of the quantity selection allows to select over 100 items
Description:
*Steps to reproduce:*

# Open browser and access [lenjeriidelux-pucioasa.ro|https://lenjeriidelux-pucioasa.ro/] website.
# Access "Huse" button
# Select a product from Huse module.
# Access the Required Field Marking of the quantity selection  and select the number of items you want to add to cart.

*Expected result:*

# It shouldn't allow to add more than 100 pieces.

*Actual result:*

# More than 100 items can be selected.

Summary: Recording of  " Aplica cupon" Button failed for code " HusaIepuras"
Description:
*Precondition:*

# You must insert valid codes. The code should not be accepted if is not one of the codes: “Husa2024”, “HusaIepuras”; “Husa5%”
# More than 11 characters are not accepted.

*Steps to reproduce:*

# Open browser and access [lenjeriidelux-pucioasa.ro|https://lenjeriidelux-pucioasa.ro/] website.
# Access "Huse" button
# Select a product from Huse module.
# Access the "Adauga in cos" button
# Click on "Cod cupon" field and insert a code.
# Access "aplica cupon" button.

*Expected result:* 

# The total amount to pay should  be updated with the dicount applied.

*Actual result:*

# An error message was displayed for the code “HusaIepuras”

Summary: “Filtreaza” button failed- The " Huse" products page is not updated
Description:
*Steps to reproduce:*

# Open browser and access [lenjeriidelux-pucioasa.ro|https://lenjeriidelux-pucioasa.ro/] website.
#  Access "Huse" Button
# Select the  price.
# Access “Filtreaza” button.

*Expected result:*

# The  "Huse" products with the selected price will be displayed.

*Actual result:*

# Filtreaza buuton failed - the “Huse” product page is not updated.
